clip.quote: I offer suburb tours to help clients decide where to live before they even start looking at houses.
clip.why_clipworthy: It highlights a unique service that adds value and differentiates the agent.
clip.suggested_hook: Struggling to decide where to live? Here's a unique service that could change the game.
